title: Drawing, "Landscape, North Carolina", 1860–70
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray-green paper.
markings: Verso: Stamped in brown ink, at lower center:  [Cooper Union] Lugt 457e; and again in black: 457b
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at bottom right: N. Carolina.
description: Vertical view of a wooded slope with a rock at center, trees at top and shrubs growing out of rocks.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Landscape, North Carolina", 1860–70.
1860–70. Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray-green paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-48.
